title: Subtle Sparkle Bangles - Dazzling Kadas for Everyday Elegance
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Stones. Features a durable
features: These sleek kadas feature a modern, minimalist design with an elegant twist pattern. Clusters of three sparkling CZ stones are strategically placed along the bangle, adding a touch of radiance. The gold plating ensures a rich, luxurious look.
colors: Warm Gold with Brilliant White (CZ) accents.
occasions: and adds a touch of sophistication to festive occasions. Perfect for gifting during birthdays or anniversaries.
description: These bangles blend modern aesthetics with the richness of traditional gold jewelry, offering a versatile accessory for every woman. The high-quality CZ stones provide the brilliance of diamonds at an accessible price point. Durable plating ensures long-lasting shine and wear.
